features: Heritage leather combined with strong, smooth leather, both made in our own tanneries, for a waxy, unique aesthetic.
Sturdy men's ankle boot has a cool yet masculine feel
Treated with innovative ECCO HYDROMAX® Technology for a water-repellent finish
ECCO FLUIDFORM™ Direct Comfort Technology bonds the upper and the sole without the compromises of a conventionally stitched or glued construction, providing exceptional cushioning and rebound
Lightweight, breathable and velvety soft Primaloft® fleece keeps your feet warm and cosy
Rubber outsole for durability and grip
